name: Echoes (itch) (tudydev)
description:
Split screen game for Epic Megajam.

The game was made by 2 people under one week. Ray-tracing is working only on windows version.

We used assets from: Quixel, Boom Library and WeLoveIndies.

Game was made using Unreal Engine 5.  Soundtrack was made in GarageBand.

Controlls: Player 1: W A S D and Space Bar (P for pause)

Player 2: Controller sticks and X button for jump.
